title: How We Hack: The HackMcGill Tools Strategy
description: Having the right tools for the job can make or break any effort. Community building and Hackathon planning are no different. When our leadership team (affectionately referred to as *Hackboard*) transitioned in April 2018, we decided to take a top down look at the tools we use to get the job done and make a conscious effort to re-evaluate every single one. This this is a summary of the first few tools we settled on. I might follow up with a second post going over some of our other choice such as *Hubspot*, *Zoho Mail*, *Missive*, and more!
